ygData.subject: Twisting Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, so I hit 35 (yeah!) and am fighting with a monk alt whose main is a bard (an awesome one at that) and he s giving me hints here and there... less talking
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, so I hit 35 (yeah!) and am fighting with a monk alt whose main is a bard
(an awesome one at that) and he's giving me hints here and there... "less
talking more twisting!"

Anyway, he tells me that I should be not only running three to four songs
but also switching out weapons and instruments while doing this.

Do you all actually do this? I tried this and its HELLA hard! So my
question is.. do you all actually do this and if so HOW.

I have #1 bank set up with 2 melee slots and 4 inventory slots, and #2 bank
set up with 6 songs... I just can't seem to hit a song, switch to #1, switch
out weapons for instrument in time to hit #2 and do a new song without
missing a beat. Am I doing something wrong or is this one of those things
that just takes practice? And yes, I'm using shift+1 to switch hotkey
banks...

Oh, btw, play with people 8 levels lower than you! I played with a monk my
level and a warrior 8 levels higher. He went through 40 in the same amount
of time it took us to go through 34 (about 3.5 hours). Sick.

Tani, 35th Bard
Halana, 57th Shaman
Paradigm
Solusek Ro


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
